00019    /* 
00020    * Constructor.
00021    */
00022    HarmonicL0Bond::HarmonicL0Bond()
00023     : nBondType_(0)
00024    {
00025       for (int i = 0; i < MaxNBondType; ++i) {
00026          kappa_[i]  =  0.0;
00027       }
00028    }
00029 
00030    /* 
00031    * Copy constructor.
00032    */
00033    HarmonicL0Bond::HarmonicL0Bond(const HarmonicL0Bond& other)
00034     : nBondType_(other.nBondType_)
00035    {
00036       for (int i = 0; i < nBondType_; ++i) {
00037          kappa_[i]  =  other.kappa_[i];
00038       }
00039    }
00040 
00041    /* 
00042    * Assignment.
00043    */
00044    HarmonicL0Bond& HarmonicL0Bond::operator = (const HarmonicL0Bond& other)
00045    {
00046       nBondType_   = other.nBondType_;
00047       for (int i = 0; i < nBondType_; ++i) {
00048          kappa_[i]  = other.kappa_[i];
00049       }
00050       return *this;
00051    }
00052 
00053    /* 
00054    * Set the nBondType_ member
00055    */
00056    void HarmonicL0Bond::setNBondType(int nBondType)
00057    {  
00058       if (nBondType > MaxNBondType) {
00059          UTIL_THROW("nBondType > HarmonicL0Bond::MaxNBondType");
00060       }
00061       nBondType_ = nBondType;
00062    }
00063 
00064    /* 
00065    * Read bond interaction parameters kappa and length from file
00066    */
00067    void HarmonicL0Bond::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00068    {
00069 
00070       // Precondition
00071       if (nBondType_ <= 0) {
00072          UTIL_THROW("nBondType must be set before readParam");
00073       }
00074 
00075       // Read parameters
00076       //readBegin(in, "HarmonicL0Bond");
00077       readCArray<double>(in, "kappa",  kappa_,  nBondType_);
00078       //readEnd(in);
00079    }
00080    
00081    /* 
00082    * Generate a random bond length chosen from an equilibrium distribution for
00083    * randomly oriented bonds. 
00084    *
00085    * Algorithm: Generate random bond vector and take the sqrt.
00086    */
00087    double HarmonicL0Bond::randomBondLength(
00088                          Random *random, double beta, int type) const
00089    {
00090       double x, y, z;
00091       x = random->gaussian();
00092       y = random->gaussian();
00093       z = random->gaussian();
00094       return sqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z)/sqrt(beta*kappa_[type]);
00095    }
00096 
00097    /*
00098    * Modify a parameter, identified by a string.
00099    */
00100    void HarmonicL0Bond::set(std::string name, int type, double value)
00101    {
00102       if (name == "kappa") {
00103          kappa_[type] = value;
00104       } else {
00105          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00106       }
00107    }
00108 
00109    /*
00110    * Get a parameter value, identified by a string.
00111    */
00112    double HarmonicL0Bond::get(std::string name, int type) const
00113    {
00114       double value;
00115       if (name == "kappa") {
00116          value = kappa_[type];
00117       } else {
00118          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00119       }
00120       return value;
00121    }

00126    std::string HarmonicL0Bond::className() const
